name: smart-building-energy-mgmt
description: Smart Building Energy Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
